intro.title: Tutorial Intro
intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

sourcing-agent/Architecture_Flows.title: Architecture Flows
sourcing-agent/Architecture_Flows.description: This document provides detailed flow diagrams illustrating the interactions, inputs/outputs, and dependencies for each component of the Agent System.

sourcing-agent/brave_api_integration.title: Brave Search API Integration
sourcing-agent/brave_api_integration.description: The Sourcing Agent now integrates with Brave Search API's advanced endpoints to provide enhanced research capabilities:

sourcing-agent/Component_Interfaces.title: Component Interfaces
sourcing-agent/Component_Interfaces.description: This document provides detailed information about the interfaces and APIs for each component in the Agent System. It serves as a reference for developers implementing new components or interacting with existing ones.

sourcing-agent/Enhanced_Retry_Functional.title: Enhanced Retry Functionality
sourcing-agent/Enhanced_Retry_Functional.description: This document describes the enhanced retry functionality available in the agent system, including timeout handling, callback tracking, and retry statistics.

sourcing-agent/index.title: Sourcing Agent Documentation
sourcing-agent/index.description: Welcome to the comprehensive documentation for the Sourcing Agent system. This documentation provides detailed information about the architecture, components, and flows of the agent system.

sourcing-agent/Module_Dependencies.title: Module Dependencies
sourcing-agent/Module_Dependencies.description: This document provides a comprehensive visualization of the dependencies between various modules in the Agent System. Understanding these dependencies is essential for maintaining and extending the system.

sourcing-agent/Modules_Core.title: Core Module
sourcing-agent/Modules_Core.description: This module provides the core components for building agent-based applications using a graph-based architecture, aligned with LangGraph's patterns.

sourcing-agent/README_DEV.title: Development Environment Setup
sourcing-agent/README_DEV.description: This project uses a modern Python development environment with uv for fast, reliable package management and virtual environments, along with Node.js tools for additional functionality.

sourcing-agent/System_Flows.title: System Flows Documentation
sourcing-agent/System_Flows.description: This document provides comprehensive flow diagrams for the Agent System, showing both module-level internal flows and inter-module interactions.

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.
